html:
Role Voice type Premiere cast, 13 January 1775
(Conductor: Johann Nepomuk Cröner)
Don Anchise, the Podestà (Mayor) of
Lagonero, in love with Sandrina 		tenor
Marchioness Violante Onesti (Sandrina),
disguised as a gardener 		soprano
Arminda, niece of Don Anchise,
engaged to Belfiore, formerly in love with Ramiro 		soprano
Contino Belfiore, engaged to Arminda tenor
Cavalier Ramiro, Arminda's rejected suitor soprano castrato
Serpetta, the Podestà's servant, in love
with the Podestà 		soprano
Roberto (Nardo), Violante's servant,
disguised as a gardener 		bass

 disguised as a gardener
